errors.can_not_vouch_twice: You cannot vouch for the same friend twice.
errors.can_not_vouch_over_limit: This friend already reached maximum vouching limit.

footnote.note_1: Vouching for your friends builds their reputation to help them evolve to Resident and Citizen.
footnote.note_2: This is how we grow trust and prevent robots from taking over!
footnote.note_3: When your friend evolves to Resident or Citizen — you earn Reputation points too, so, help them out! But if they're a bot — you lose points, so only vouch for people you know.

transaction.sign_transaction: Securely sign the transaction to vouch for a friend
